item.title: By: Folkert
item.dc:creator: Folkert
item.description:
Well exelent choise with will bring the peace back in your comments and in your mailbox. Had 2 logs, 1 with this hack and 1 without. The one without had a number of plugins and hacks , and had renamed comment files. Still they manage to deliver me around 5 a 9 hunderd spams a day. Yesterday they managed to actualy bypass all the spamblock things and posted around 400 comments. That was the end for me, now al my wordpress logs have this hack.
cheers
item.content:encoded:
Well exelent choise with will bring the peace back in your comments and in your mailbox.
Had 2 logs, 1 with this hack and 1 without. The one without had a number of plugins and hacks , and had renamed comment files. Still they manage to deliver me around 5 a 9 hunderd spams a day. Yesterday they managed to actualy bypass all the spamblock things and posted around 400 comments. That was the end for me, now al my wordpress logs have this hack.

cheers
